name: Dicing For A Better Life
description:
You are playing as a dice, that everybody calls Kiddo. 
One day you dicide to leave the factory you were created at. 
You share a dream with your older Dice, to leave this place, see the sun and feel the wind...
So this is how your adventure begins

* * *

Play as a special dice with different abilities, such as jump, push, talk and etc. 
Use your ability by selecting side of a Dice and your target with your mouse! Yess, you not only control your own jumps, hehe. But try not to damage yourself!
Most unexepected immersive sim of 2022 !
